p: JEV viral RNA can be detected from viremic vertebrate samples and mosquitoes by many different available assays spanning traditional single-plex RT-PCR ( 89, 90), to more complex multiplex assays to screen samples for multiple arboviruses simultaneously ( 91). The multiplex assay developed by Wang et al. targets; “WNV, Saint Louis encephalitis virus, Venezuelan equine encephalomyelitis virus, Western equine encephalomyelitis virus, Eastern equine encephalomyelitis virus, Highlands J virus and JEV” ( 91).
